name: SparseMatrix_Double
desc: A structure that contains a sparse matrix of double-precision, floating-point values.

items.name: init(structure: SparseMatrixStructure, data: UnsafeMutablePointer<Double>)
items.desc: Creates a sparse matrix with the specified structure that contains double-precision values.

items.name: var structure: SparseMatrixStructure
items.desc: The sparsity structure of the matrix.

items.name: var data: UnsafeMutablePointer<Double>
items.desc: The array of contiguous values in the nonzero blocks of the matrix.

items.name: struct SparseMatrixStructure
items.desc: A structure that represents the sparsity structure of a sparse matrix.

items.name: struct SparseAttributes_t
items.desc: A structure that represents the attributes of a matrix.
